text: Once and Forever is a 1927 American silent drama film directed by Phil Goldstone and starring Patsy Ruth Miller, John Harron and Burr McIntosh.Munden p.567 The film's sets were designed by the art director George Sawley. ==Cast== * Patsy Ruth Miller as Antoinette * John Harron as Georges * Burr McIntosh as Governor * Emily Fitzroy as Katherine * Adele Watson as Henriette * Vadim Uraneff as Axel ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1927 films Category:1927 drama films Category:English- language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Phil Goldstone Category:American black-and-white films Category:Tiffany Pictures films
title: Once and Forever
